trans-unit.source: Indicates that [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] could not read either the deployment or application manifests.
trans-unit.target: Angir at [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] kan ikke lese den distribusjon eller programmet programmanifest.

trans-unit.source: InvalidDeploymentException indicates the existence of a corrupt deployment or application manifest in a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: InvalidDeploymentException viser at en skadet distribusjon eller programmanifest i en [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet.

trans-unit.source: The error might occur because the manifests are poorly formed, have unrecognized elements for their schemas, or have mismatched digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: Feilen kan oppstå fordi programmanifest dårlig utformet har ukjente elementer for skjemaene deres eller har ugyldig signaturer.

trans-unit.source: You are more likely to have corruption if you manually edit the deployment or application manifest files with a text editor.
trans-unit.target: Du er mer sannsynlig at ødelagt hvis du redigere distribusjonen eller programmet manifest-filene med et tekstredigeringsprogram manuelt.

trans-unit.source: You can usually correct this problem by regenerating your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment, which will create new deployment and application manifests.
trans-unit.target: Du kan løse dette problemet vanligvis ved regenerering din [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] distribusjon, som oppretter nye distribusjon og programmet programmanifest.

trans-unit.source: For more detailed debugging steps, see the following links.
trans-unit.target: Mer detaljert fremgangsmåte for feilsøking i følgende koblinger.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException"></xref> class with the specified message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException"> </xref> klassen med den angitte meldingen som beskriver unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren for denne konstruktøren kreves for å sikre at denne strengen er lokalisert for den gjeldende kulturen i systemet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som har datatypen serialiserte objektet.

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: Kontekstavhengig informasjon om kilden eller målet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren for denne konstruktøren kreves for å sikre at denne strengen er lokalisert for den gjeldende kulturen i systemet.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket er årsaken til den gjeldende unntaket.

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `innerException` -parameteren er ikke <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, oppstår det gjeldende unntaket i en <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""> </xref> blokken som behandler det interne unntaket.
